item.title: Anonymous question app Sendit deceived children and illegally collected their data, FTC alleges
item.description: On Sendit, teens can send each other anonymous questions via integrations with Instagram or Snapchat.

item.title: Former OpenAI and DeepMind researchers raise whopping $300M seed to automate science
item.description: Periodic Labs has raised from a tech industry who's who, including Andreessen Horowitz, Nvidia, Elad Gil, Jeff Dean, Eric Schmidt, and Jeff Bezos.
